long_description: The REI Guide gloves combine warmth and good dexterity to keep your hands comfortable grasping ski poles, ice axes and other mountain gear. Nylon shells have waterproof, breathable inserts that keep your hands dry while you're skiing, snowboarding and hiking. Leather palms and durable goatskin patches give you a secure grip of ski poles, ice axes and other mountain equipment. Synthetic insulation helps keep your hands warm on chilly winter days. Low-profile neoprene cuffs with rip-and-stick closures seal tightly around wrists to keep warmth in. Wipe your cold nose with the soft patches on the thumbs. Clip a carabiner (sold separately) through the loops on the pinky fingers to hang the REI Guide gloves from your climbing harness.
